mapper.sql: factory_id, factory_no, factory_no1, factory_no2, legalperson, factory_name, factory_usedname, factory_size, county_city_dec, county_city, total_value, county_name, county_id, industry_bigid, industry_name, industry_bigname, industry_id, addressdetail, address, county_register_city_dec, county_register_city, aregisterdetail, power_amount, address_register, countyid_register_dec, countyid_register, factory_longitude, factory_latitude, source_type, gasequ_type, year, flag, last_changed_time, audit_time, filling_time, devicestatus, boilerstatus, kilnstatus, Year_days, Days_hours, CITY_NAME, CITY_ID, total_output, factorystatus, exhauststatus, statusdec, status, exhaust_num, important, shihuaflag, feiqnub, principal_name, principal_phone, principal_mobile, principal_email, lat1, lon1, lat2, lon2, lat3, lon3, lat4, lon4, lat5, lon5, lat6, lon6, lat7, lon7
mapper.select: SELECT factory.factory_id, factory.factory_no1, factory.factory_name, factory.factory_latitude, factory.factory_longitude, factory.total_value, factory.total_output, factory.factory_size, factory.source_type, factory.`year`, factory.county_city, city.city_name, factory.COUNTY_ID, county.COUNTY_NAME, factory.`status`, `status`.introduction AS statusdec FROM factory LEFT JOIN city ON factory.county_city=city.city_code LEFT JOIN county ON factory.county_id=county.COUNTY_ID LEFT JOIN `status` ON factory.`status`=`status`.id ORDER BY factory.total_output DESC
SELECT * FROM factory WHERE factory_id < #{factoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER} ORDER BY factory_id DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT * FROM factory WHERE factory_id >#{factoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER} ORDER BY factory_id ASC LIMIT 1
select count(*) from factory where factory_no1 = #{factoryNo1}
